website_summaries.verdict: When used with your own diffuser, this mix of essential oils is intended for you to inhale while you sleep in order to help stay asleep all night long.
pros: Helps with relaxation and better sleep
Includes copaiba balsam and marjoram in addition to the chamomile, lavender and clary sage found in other similar products
Can also be used as a linen spray
cons: You will need to provide your own diffuser for this product

customer_reviews.title: Best Sleep in a long time
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this oil. I deal with insomnia weekly and ever since I started putting this oil into my diffuser, I am now able to fall asleep quickly. I have a 300ml diffuser and put 6 to 8 drops of the oil in. I have it sitting by my side of the bed but it will fill the whole room. My husband loves the smell and will relax and knock him out. I also sleep more soundly using this oil and feel so much more rested in the morning. I will be buying more of this before I run out. I highly reccomend and you will not be disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Diana P

customer_reviews.title: Works nice and wish I did not try other stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is first oil I try for sleeping issue and I purchase another oil "Healing solutions" and had worst effects So I made sure and I purchase additional supply from this company. Using Oils can be tricky on Amazon, but I had success personally with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gagdet Man

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME for 2/3 of us
customer_reviews.text: First off, this smells GREAT. A very relaxing spa-like scent. I got it because both my roommates and I have so much trouble sleeping. Anxiety & unpredictable schedules don’t help. Anyway, we put 5 drops in a diffuser. That was a little strong. I’d start with 3 for a small room. We all knocked out w/in about 30 mins. Yay! Sadly, I woke up after 4 hours. The good news is: they both slept through the night for the first time in forever, and all 3 of us felt way more rested than usual. Even though I only got 4 hours, I feel like the quality of sleep was better than normal. I’m gonna use it every night :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you get any oils for your diffuser...get THIS ONE!!
customer_reviews.text: This aroma is amazing! Man I wanna sleep right now!! Highly addictive smelling and utterly relaxing!!! Superb smelling! If I had to describe it im gonna say it smells kinda a little woodsy tropical Spa-ish? If that confuses any one sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey, CA

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I don't ever want to get out of bed with this diffusing! Smells so wonderful. I love that there aren't too many oils in the blend, but just enough to make it wonderful. Love love love it! Great price for the ounce, too!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Stress and anxiety reducer
customer_reviews.text: Being a mom, wife, and working full time job in insurance sales this stuff is amazing at reducing my anxiety and stress.
customer_reviews.author: candice brown

customer_reviews.title: I use it in my kiddos diffusers every night - not too strong but fills their rooms with a nice calming scent
customer_reviews.text: Smells lovely ! I use it in my kiddos diffusers every night - not too strong but fills their rooms with a nice calming scent ! 450ml diffuser I use about 10 -12 drops a night
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this scent
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent! The lavender is very noticeable which I really like! I have definitely noticed a difference in my relaxation before bed when I use this. I also seem to get a deeper sleep. Will be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: lspike

customer_reviews.title: Not effective, no solid aroma - very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This oil has apparently far less of the quality ingredients than other brands, because we have to put twice as much into our device in order to get a noticeable odor in the room. Very disappointing to have to supplement this product with lavender from another company. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to diffuse at night with one drop of sandalwood or cedarwood atlas.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical because its a 30ml bottle for a great price. It smells great! Very nice off the bottle and fantastic in my diffuser. I use this at night before i go to sleep and I add one drop of sandalwood (2 drops of cedarwood atlas works too) with about 7 drops of this sleep blend. Pretty awesome! I really love sleep blends that include copaiba. I kinda won't even consider one that doesn't. This one includes copaiba and I'm very happy! This particular blend of essential oils may not be as strong as some, but for the price, I'm stoked. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Katwomandu

customer_reviews.title: Good Night Sleep Calming Blend did help some but like ...
customer_reviews.text: did not work as well as I thought it might I have had a sleep problem for years and have tried many thing with little help for many and no help form some. Good Night Sleep Calming Blend did help some but like I said not a lot. I get about 2 hours sleep with it which is more than I get with out it.
customer_reviews.author: mary Dockall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, arrived quick. Can't wait to try it in our new diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ihlefeld

customer_reviews.title: Sleep peacefully!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this oil now for a few nights.. and it has helped me sleep a more restful sleep!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lois Knorr

customer_reviews.title: Fall asleep faster!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice, relaxing, lavender scent. I work nights and I like to try several things to help me sleep. I use this in a diffuser, sprinkled on my pillow, and sometimes I'll massage my feet with it too. I've only used this essential oil for a couple of weeks and I've noticed that helps me to fall asleep faster.
customer_reviews.author: J.King

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this oil. I've had terrible insomnia for years and I'd been using Benadryl and Nyquil ZZZs for several years . I decided to give that up because I knew using that long term would be harmful. I ordered this oil, a diffuser, a weighted blanket and now take 5 mg Melatonin. I've been sleeping like a baby. Try it, you'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Dreams come in many ways,mine came in a little bottle of lavender
customer_reviews.text: I have been unable to sleep for awhile so when I came across the Aromatherapy scented oil in lavender ,I bought it and used it as soon as I got it. I put a few drops in a difusser ,our bedroom was filled with the most wonderful calming scent of a garden filled. With beautiful lavender flowers. Before I knew it I was in the best sleep I've had in a long time, even my husband said he felt real calm. Thank you for my little bottle of dreams.
customer_reviews.author: Norinda

customer_reviews.title: I AM NOT BIG ON PERFUME! BUT THIS IS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I am not a perfume person. I was hesitant to order this BUT I am so glad that I did!!! I put about 10 drops in my difusser enjoy the clean fragrance of this blend I will order it again LittleBlue
customer_reviews.author: Little Blue

customer_reviews.title: Helped my insomina a bunch
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product. Having insomnia for years, this product has been an incredibly welcome addition to my night time routine. I use it in a cool air diffuser and have had much better success with falling asleep much more quickly and staying asleep when I use this oil blend.
customer_reviews.author: Bryn Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great for diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every single night in my bedside defuser. The scent is subtle but lovely and a few drops are all I need to use daily. Getting a lot of use for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Diana W.

customer_reviews.title: I Love a good nights sleep!
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard for me to get to sleep and I must say I put a few drops in my diffuser and rub a few drops on the soles of my feet. I sleep so much better!! Great product and love the amount I get for my money. Second time I have purchased Goodnight Sleep Blend and will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Calming and relaxing
customer_reviews.text: Been placing 2 drops on the bottom of my feet. Yes it is very relaxing and calming. It has taken about a week to get results. Been sleeping more restful and would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Insomniac who loves this!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty picky when it comes to sleep scents because Im an insomniac. I've purchased some of the best sleep scents in the past but they are discontinued now. I really love this one!!! I put a few drops on my sleep mask and it was so calming. And didnt disapate even hours later.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Burden

customer_reviews.title: It works!!! Surprisingly, tried many sleep ...
customer_reviews.text: It works!!! Surprisingly, tried many sleep oils and this one is the one. More expensive, but double the product in size and well worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: I expected the bottle to be larger based on the photos and the price, but that’s my fault for not reading the ML. Either way, I love the scent of this blend. It’s very relaxing, I use it most nights before bed or even diffuse it while taking a bath. A few drops tend to go a long way. I will definitely purchase it again once my current bottle runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely our families favorite. We use in our sons and daughter room, and they don’t sleep without it on. We have tried other sleep and relaxing blends, however, none work as good as this and at this affordable price point for the quality product that it is.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Todd

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a spa ,but DID NOT  make me sleep better
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing lets see how it helps me sleep . It smells like a spa very relaxing ********** update It DOEST not help me sleep ....Im a mother & have bad insomnia. I had to buy melatonin pills & that helped me . This is a great mood / room setter but it wont cure my insomnia & hasn't melatonin did that for me
customer_reviews.author: Sandra tabar

customer_reviews.title: Very Good product !!
customer_reviews.text: I was using Lavander oil on my humidifier but this oil is even better . Smells nice and really gave me a better sleep . I use it every day now . Love it .
customer_reviews.author: Ligia Sommers

customer_reviews.title: Service was excellent! The package arrived promptly but the bottle was ...
customer_reviews.text: Service was excellent! The package arrived promptly but the bottle was leaking so Natural Riches sent me another bottle which was amazing because I wasn't even expecting it! The oil is great! I love the smell and the price too! You won't find a better deal anywhere else. Thank you guys for making these oils affordable to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Does not have a strong lavender smell
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the smell of lavender although I tolerate it for its sleep factor. This one isn’t super strong. I start my diffuser about 1/2 hr before I head to bed. My room has a pleasant smell when I hit the bed. I gave it 4 stars because it leaked during shipment. I’d say about 1/4 of the bottle was gone. Otherwise, it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee Webster

customer_reviews.title: Full night of sleep
customer_reviews.text: We use this essential oil mix at bedtime. We have a hard time falling asleep and staying asleep. This mix of oils is like taking a sleeping pill. We run our diffuser all night and ever since we got this oil we fall asleep and stay asleep. I recommend this to anyone who is having the same issues at night like we are. We tried lavender for a while but we will only use this sleep essential mix from now on. Very much so worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Corpus

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and just wonderful scent
customer_reviews.text: A few drops in some water in the diffuser on my bedside table and I have the most scentsational release of stress that lets me soon drift off to sleep. The company is so helpful and will reply to questions promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Strong Scent
customer_reviews.text: I find the scent overpowering. I have only tried it twice. I put a little drop on a cotton ball and put it under my pillow. I truly didn’t find it helped in any way: sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Callaghan

customer_reviews.title: I found it easier to sleep...
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to my life's stressors, I often spend the nights tossing and turning, unable to turn off my mind till morning (-.-). Tired of the sleeping pills, which only made things worst, I decided to try this essential oil. And that my friend was the best decision I've ever made. After using this aromatherapy, I found it easier to sleep, the minute I cuddle up with my favorite fuzzy blanket. And I'll be waking up feeling enthusiastic and satisfied with my sleep. It also enhances my mood whenever I'm feeling annoyed with everything around me. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Cesia

customer_reviews.title: Better zzzzzz’s
customer_reviews.text: Smells good. Gave as gift to daughters friend and she said she really likes it and it helps her sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: JLF

customer_reviews.title: No aroma
customer_reviews.text: There really isn’t a smell to this. Good price, but not sure there is any actual benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great blend
customer_reviews.text: A really nice blend of relaxing scents. It works well in my diffuser to wind down before bed.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful for sleep problems
customer_reviews.text: This is a great essential oil for anyone who has trouble sleeping. I use a few drops on my pillow before going to sleep, and it helps me not only fall asleep faster, but stay asleep longer too.
customer_reviews.author: Waverly Butler

customer_reviews.title: No effect and waste of money
customer_reviews.text: No effect whatsoever on sleep. Scent is overwhelming and unpleasant. Would not recommend this product to anyone and I will surely not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: danny khamsy

customer_reviews.title: that's good for me
customer_reviews.text: Only has this for 3 days but I seem to be sleeping 2 hours longer a night, that's good for me. I put it on my pillow. Love it so far....
customer_reviews.author: Dedra R

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scent, big bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Great scent for relaxing at days end. I also like it for lazy Sat nights at home on the couch watching movies with the family. Only need a few drops in the diffuser to get relaxing scent filling the room.
customer_reviews.author: OC Girl

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is nice for the money, but if you are into essential oils, it's not as potent so you need a lot of it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite for sleep thus far!!
customer_reviews.text: Pure lavender scent. I've tried several lavender essential oils and mixes for sleep and this one is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: S Wat

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in excellent condition. The scent is nice, strong and long lasting. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep oil!
customer_reviews.text: This oil has the most amazing smell! Seriously, it smells so beautiful and instantly relaxes you. We use it directly on skin, and also in a diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Seahawks Dad

customer_reviews.title: after using this product following the instructions I slept like a baby for 5 hours straight
customer_reviews.text: Before I would sleep at intervals of 2 hours top. Then, I would wake up in the middle of the night to use the bathroom or raid the refrigerator. But, after using this product following the instructions I slept like a baby for 5 hours straight. In addition, I started dreaming again. Before this product I never dreamed; so, this was really a surprise to me, the fact that was able to dream again; and so many dreams, too. It really works!
customer_reviews.author: alixC009

customer_reviews.title: Very Soothing
customer_reviews.text: I've tried diffusing a lot of different oils but I really like this one for sleep. It has a very soft, soothing scent and I find it very relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Mom's World

customer_reviews.title: Sleep help
customer_reviews.text: Put some in a mister in the bedroom my husband typically gets up 3to 4 times a night. He is experiencing less wake ups and seems to be sleeping sounder. I have chronic insomnia so I also roll it on the bottoms of my feet. I am not realizing much change in my lack of sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Q

customer_reviews.title: Good Night Sleep essential oil I love it
customer_reviews.text: I received my essential oil and use it in my diffuser for the first time and last night I slept like a baby the aroma was fascinating. I recommended to everyone that have problem to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Mass

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and great for sleep!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful eo combination! It comes with the dropper squeeze cap, which I prefer. Makes the bedrooms smell dreamy at nighttime!
customer_reviews.author: BillyTommy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my air diffuser starting when I get home and all through the night. I feel relaxed and get a good night's sleep. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this on a wash cloth nightly that I place between pillows on the bed. I find the scent soothing and relaxing. I don’t know that it helps me sleep, but I can tell I relax with it and that in itself is good for me.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lepse

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the results.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my sons, one who has Narcolepsy and one who has ADHD to assist them with getting to sleep. My oldest son has tried it first and said he felt like it really helped him. The bottle is a nice size (a little larger than other bottles I have). Will continue using and will try with other son soon.
customer_reviews.author: M Meyer

customer_reviews.title: I'm satisfied with this sleep essential oil
customer_reviews.text: I'm satisfied with this sleep essential oil. I have only tried one other before. I will say I like this one better. This is a nice size bottle and will the little amount it takes each night it should last me a long time. I am happy with the service
customer_reviews.author: Inella Northrup

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing oil for sleep! I diffuse every single night in our room and sleep like a baby. This is my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: QSmitts

customer_reviews.title: This smells amazing! :O
customer_reviews.text: This is a big bottle considering that a drop goes a long way! This smells amazing, and it's perfect for days of stress and for nights wherein I couldn't get some sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Shelter

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: This smells amazingly good! And I know that I have been sleeping better since I started diffusing it in the bedroom at night. It's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one because I liked a smaller size that came in a set. It is the same blend and works really well, I use it every night and sleep better than I ever have. I am super happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rihana

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell but weak
customer_reviews.text: It definitely smells nice, but you need a lot of it to smell it in a diffuser. I had a different brand of oil before, where I added 2 drops to my diffuser and it smelled stronger than 10 drops of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Huge thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Soothing for both body and soul, and I'm not even exaggerating lol. The smell is a huge thumbs up, and I noticed that whenever I put drops of this on the humidifier as I crawl into bed, I fall asleep almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Pringles

customer_reviews.title: Super worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I got rid of my sleeping pills and bought this healing scent, I finally find it more natural to achieve an incredibly restful night of sleep. Just a few drops of these bad boys into my diffuser before bedtime will definitely fill my room with gentle, soothing, and pacifying aromas. And before I knew it, I was already drifting off to dreamland. Super worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: All natural ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Works well in my diffuser using lately would recommend anybody needs a good nights sleep
customer_reviews.author: Albert j Sardina sr.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded my expections. My mother in law is sleeping better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent
customer_reviews.text: I do not care too much for the scent, it’s a little strong for me. But the scent does last in my diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: nice scrnt thst lingers. but eoy pit you yo dlumberlandp
customer_reviews.text: The acent is great and the firections are essy enpigh yo gollow. Forsn’t really onfuce slerp
customer_reviews.author: evelyn alvir

customer_reviews.title: Musty Smell
customer_reviews.text: The bottle came with a lot of product but unfortunately when using in an aromatherapy diffuser it gives off a moldy musty smell. Did not notice any aid in sleeping. I used the entire bottle just to give it a fair shot but for $14 it just made my room smell like mold. Not planning to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: scarleyastyle

customer_reviews.title: A little strong
customer_reviews.text: I have 150 mL DEF user I use three drops and it’s a little strong two drops and I can’t really smell it much but it works good I definitely feel like I rest better now that I use it
customer_reviews.author: Mr S.

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my diffuser at night and love the scent!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I really like this essential oil blend. I add about 20-30 drops to my diffuser every night and I've been able to fall asleep faster and actually stay asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Sean D

customer_reviews.title: Night smells
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product, and it works but I don't like the smell.
customer_reviews.author: minerva

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Oil
customer_reviews.text: The scent isn't too strong it is enough to help you relax, it can make you breath better and it releases the tension in your body and mind.
customer_reviews.author: Evie Martin

customer_reviews.title: Waist of money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the product for my daughter. I tried it on her and myself. It did nothing for neither of us.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: so worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Now, this is an essential oil that's so worth the purchase! My anxiety is acting up more often lately, and it's even affecting my sleep. Thankfully, I have this. Its smells relaxes and melts away all the tension in my body after a whole day of stress, and this is even helping me get some sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Is this the smell of heaven? 0:)
customer_reviews.text: This aromatherapy did a pretty great job of quieting my busy brain and winding me down before bedtime. And what I found most impressive? Its divine smell. Jesus Christ, is this the smell of heaven? Trust me, it's one of the most relaxing and soothing aromas that I've ever sniffed.
customer_reviews.author: Springs

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!!! 3rd bottle that I have ordered. never be without!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bentleys Mom

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it.
customer_reviews.text: This is ok. I don't know if it will help you sleep or not. I can't stand to smell it long enough to tell. I don't like lavender and that's what I smell the most in this. Gave it 3 stars because somebody probably will like it. Just not me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Use it in my humidifier and it smells amazing
customer_reviews.author: Jill Cahoon

customer_reviews.title: It sure helps me
customer_reviews.text: I rub a few drops on my skin and a few drops on my pillow and it helps me get some sleep
customer_reviews.author: mauri buckner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome oil!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good quality, nice aroma, helps me and my kids to relax & fall asleep at night !
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Ehh...
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite by the brand. It can be rather overpowering (& not in a good way)
customer_reviews.author: Carli Henrotay

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: This sleep oil has a clean, relaxing scent and it worked really well to help me fall asleep. Just try mixing a few drops with a diffuser or diluter and you will sleep like a baby
customer_reviews.author: Tatum Carter

customer_reviews.title: Helps me fall asleep
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality essential oil. This has a very relaxing scent. It helps me fall asleep so much more easily than before. I'll definitely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: A little sleepy 😴
customer_reviews.text: Smells good and seems to function well. We use it at night and it might be helping us sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Soulful74

customer_reviews.title: Product helps with relaxation and sleep
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Have a hard time sleeping. This helps. This review is true
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: when this thing came is spilled and leaked everywhere. The scent is super strong and I personally don't like this product. Hopefully this can be returned but my honest opinion is to not get this and if you have insomnia to use a better product than this.
customer_reviews.author: SY

customer_reviews.title: Mood Enhancer
customer_reviews.text: It enhances my mood every time I put this in my humidifier. When you had a long day and you just want to relax. I recommend this product for people who wants to relax.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Marie Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell/Blend
customer_reviews.text: My family loves it, too so I had to get my sons their own. Love it & go to bed with this one every night
customer_reviews.author: Opinion

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really work for me. Smells about the same as all the other sleep oil blends.
customer_reviews.author: kakrohn

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my diffuser. It does what it claims.
customer_reviews.author: G.W

customer_reviews.title: Sleeps Better
customer_reviews.text: I put this on a humidifier every night I go to sleep. I have insomnia and have trouble sleeping and when I put this on it knocks me directly to sleep. My sleep is peaceful and it recharges my energy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarrah Ainsworth

customer_reviews.title: This oil smells so good...
customer_reviews.text: This oil smells so good. It's basically like sleep and relaxation in a bottle! I bought this since a friend recommended aromatherapy for inducing sleep, and it's lovely. It has a good mixture of oils, the smell lingers for a while, and it's not too greasy when I apply it on skin.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Scent
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed the scent, but it was hard to dispense several drops in our diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I like this scent. It is relaxing. It hints of. Balsam... I'm an outdoor girl, and pine makes me imagine hikes and freedom. But, nevermind me, try it! Breathe deep and intentionally relax your mind and body. I think it will do its job. It has really helped our sleep!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Helps me to sleep, a good product, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent
customer_reviews.text: Really loved the scent of this product! Definitely helped to relax. I think you get a fair amount for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product !! This is the second time buying these oils ! They help our 3 yr old sleep soundly through the night! Actually last night after putting the oils in it defusor I accidentally dropped the glass bottle and it shattered ;( Wish the bottle was plastic instead, but we will be buying more!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: use
customer_reviews.text: I don't like having to mix with carrier oil to use on skin. I have something I bought from health food store and I just apply to my temples and it works so I guess I'll use this in a diffuser
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Newberry

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my diffuser and the scent is pleasant. I wish it had a eye dropper to dispense like some of the others I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Silvers

customer_reviews.title: Great soothing relaxing scent
customer_reviews.text: Awesome soothing scents to diffuse when trying to wind down or fall asleep
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Coppola

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I found it to be just as good as the higher priced oils and just as good!
customer_reviews.author: catherine cronin

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I do think it helps to calm my mind. I just started using it so I'm hoping that it will really help with my sleep issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Baker

product_meta.title: Natural Riches Aromatherapy Good Night Sleep Blend, Calming Essential Oils -30ml Pure and Natural Therapeutic Grade, Relaxation, Stress, Anxiety Relief - 30ml
feature_bullets: NATURAL RICHES AROMATHERAPY ESSENTIAL OILS Serenity, Peace & Calming Blend: Creates RELAXING GOOD SLEEP environment. A tranquil environment of SERENITY naturally CALMS the body and mind. These Sleep Oils are Extracted from plants which are grown in their Natural habitat, ensuring the highest therapeutic value. Ingredients: Dutch Lavender, Clary Sage from Moldovo, Copaiba Balsam from Brazil, Marjoram from Spain, Chamomile from France

GREAT FOR RELAXING MIND AND BODY, PROMOTING SLEEP. Helps boost's mood, reduce anxiety and depression. All our Oils are 100% Pure, Natural, Therapeutic Grade, Unfiltered, Undiluted, Non-additives, Non-fillers, Non-synthetics, GMO-free, Best for Aromatherapy & Scents. Purity Tested, Quality Guaranteed, GCMS tested to ensure 100% quality. The best smelling, most therapeutic and effective product amongst all sleep blends

PLACE FEW DROPS ON pillow, comforter or bed sheets. Massage on the bottom of feet to release tension. Use as Massage Oil to release stress and help relax body and mind. Massage reflex points of feet, back, neck or temples for a soothing and relaxing effect
Use as a DIFFUSER to help promote sleep environment. ADDING GOOD NIGHT SLEEP ESSENTIAL OILS TO BATH is a great way to unwind before bed

100 % MONEY BACK Guarantee Our oil blend is the best in the market. We GUARANTEE it with a LIFETIME hassle-free money back guarantee. Just contact us and we'll refund you your order if you are not satisfied with the purchase Try our oil risk free. Packaged in high quality dark amber glass bottle with euro style dropper and tamper proof seal cap. Euro style dropper will allow controlled oil dispensing for easy oil dropping for measurement without spilling
